QuestData.Title: Tortolla's Revenge
QuestData.Description: The mountain blooms again! If we act quickly, we can press our advantage.$B$BOur old friend Tortolla, the turtle ancient, is already on the move. At his own pace, of course...$B$BFind Tortolla east of here, at the head of the path leading down into the scorched plains. Our strongholds there fell early in the campaign, but perhaps now we can reclaim them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Tortolla at the Scorched Plain in Mount Hyjal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Tortolla at the Scorched Plain in Mount Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: $R.$B$BI remember you. Savior of my children.$B$BThe time has come. For vengeance.
